channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for SD
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for SD

item.title: Report X-2023101262
item.description:
Report X-2023101262

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-17T18:14:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-09
  • City: SIOUX FALLS
  • State: SD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Hazmat package was found while unloading the package on the preload. DescribePack: A loose cap on one of the 6 liter containers leaked. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: Leakage marks on the outer fiberboard box were noticed but the fiberboard box was dry when the package was unloaded. There was no liquid to clean up. The liquid had evaporated.
